entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms over southern sections late this afternoon. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Risk of thunderstorms over southern sections early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
